title: CIP-0119 Common
description: Metadata document for Cardano DReps, extending CIP-100

hashAlgorithm.title: Hash Algorithm
hashAlgorithm.description: The algorithm used to authenticate this document externally (CIP-100)

body.title: Body
body.description: The body of the metadata document that is hashed to produce a signature (CIP-100)

paymentAddress.title: Payment Address
paymentAddress.description: Donations or other payments to a DRep should be made to this address

username.title: Username
username.description: The human readable name of a DRep

picture.title: Profile Picture
picture.description: A base64 encoded image representing the profile picture of a DRep

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.description: A short description of what the person believes and what they want to achieve as a DRep

motivations.title: Motivations
motivations.description: A short description of why they want to be a DRep, what personal and professional experiences have they had that have driven them to register

qualifications.title: Motivations
qualifications.description: A space where the registrant can to list the qualifications they hold that are relevant to their role as a DRep

doNotList.title: Do Not List
doNotList.description: Explanation of how the governance action addresses the problem outlined in 'motivation'

referenceHash.title: Reference Hash
referenceHash.description: A hash of a reference document
